title: Course 1
description: This course covers the fundamentals of relational databases with a focus on MySQL. Topics include data modeling, SQL queries, and database management.

title: Course 2
description: An introductory course to the C programming language, suitable for beginners. Learn the basics of programming and algorithmic thinking.

title: Course 3
description: Dive into the world of algorithms. This course explores algorithm design and analysis, covering essential data structures and problem-solving techniques.

title: Course 4
description: Get started with C++ programming and apply it to solving data structures and algorithms problems. Ideal for those preparing for technical interviews.

title: Course 5
description: Explore the principles and practices of software engineering. Learn about software development methodologies, project management, and quality assurance.

title: Course 6
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills in programming. This course focuses on algorithmic thinking and problem-solving techniques.

title: Course 7
description: Learn the fundamentals of object-oriented programming (OOP) using the Python programming language. Understand classes, objects, and inheritance.

title: Course 8
description: Explore cloud computing and Amazon Web Services (AWS). This course covers cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment on AWS.

title: Course 9
description: Get started with fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and stacks. This course provides a solid foundation in data structures.
